ground_truth.thought: 创建一个带有专业主题的PowerPoint演示文稿并保存它
ground_truth.name: PPT.create_file

origin_prompt.content: 作为一名投资分析师，我需要整理一份关于消费品市场风险敞口的报告。请从文件 'data_v2/market_data/consumer_goods_report.txt' 中读取数据，并将其加入到一个新的PowerPoint演示文稿中。演示文稿应使用专业主题，并保存在 'outputs/consumer_goods_report.pptx'。此外，我希望在演示文稿中添加一个标题为 '消费品市场风险分析' 的文本页，其中包括从文件中提取的前三个关键点。当前这一步的目标是什么?
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'file_path'的值是什么?

{'text': 'The consumer goods market has experienced significant fluctuations over the past month.
Notable changes include a decline in retail sales and an increase in online shopping trends.
The overall market is expected to remain volatile in the coming weeks.
...'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'text': 'The consumer goods market has experienced significant fluctuations over the past month.
Notable changes include a decline in retail sales and an increase in online shopping trends.
The overall market is expected to remain volatile in the coming weeks.
...'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
创建一个带有专业主题的PowerPoint演示文稿并保存它
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
